chapter.title: What's new in Spring Integration 4.2?
chapter.para: This chapter provides an overview of the new features and improvements that have been introduced with Spring Integration 4.1. If you are interested in more details, please see the Issue Tracker tickets that were resolved as part of the 4.1 development process.

section.title: Wire Tap
section.para: As an alternative to the existing selector attribute, the <wire-tap/> now supports the selector-expression attribute.

section.title: File Outbound Channel Adapter
section.para: The <int-file:outbound-channel-adapter> and <int-file:outbound-gateway> now support an append-new-line attribute. If set to true, a new line is appended to the file after a message is written. The default attribute value is false.

section.title: Class Package Change
section.para: The ScatterGatherHandler class has been moved from the org.springframework.integration.handler to the org.springframework.integration.scattergather.
